testcase.name: [centos] Verify: TEST_CASE: Verify Apache package is installed on RedHat that=["'httpd' in ansible_facts.packages"], fail_msg=Apache (httpd) package is not installed on RedHat system
[ubuntu] Verify: TEST_CASE: Verify Apache package is installed on RedHat that=["'httpd' in ansible_facts.packages"], fail_msg=Apache (httpd) package is not installed on RedHat system
[centos] Verify: TEST_CASE: Verify Apache package is installed on Debian that=["'apache2' in ansible_facts.packages"], fail_msg=Apache (apache2) package is not installed on Debian system
[ubuntu] Verify: TEST_CASE: Verify Apache package is installed on Debian that=["'apache2' in ansible_facts.packages"], fail_msg=Apache (apache2) package is not installed on Debian system

[ubuntu] Verify: TEST_CASE: Assert httpd service is running on RedHat that=["'httpd' in ansible_facts.services or 'httpd.service' in ansible_facts.services", "ansible_facts.services.get('httpd.service').state == 'running'"], fail_msg=Apache (httpd) service is not running on RedHat system, success_msg=Apache (httpd) service is running on RedHat system

[centos] Verify: TEST_CASE: Assert httpd service is running on RedHat that=["'httpd' in ansible_facts.services or 'httpd.service' in ansible_facts.services", "ansible_facts.services.get('httpd.service').state == 'running'"], fail_msg=Apache (httpd) service is not running on RedHat system, success_msg=Apache (httpd) service is running on RedHat system

[centos] Verify: TEST_CASE: Assert apache2 service is running on Debian that=["'apache2' in ansible_facts.services", "ansible_facts.services['apache2'].state == 'running'"], fail_msg=Apache (apache2) service is not running on Debian system, success_msg=Apache (apache2) service is running on Debian system

[ubuntu] Verify: TEST_CASE: Assert apache2 service is running on Debian that=["'apache2' in ansible_facts.services", "ansible_facts.services['apache2'].state == 'running'"], fail_msg=Apache (apache2) service is not running on Debian system, success_msg=Apache (apache2) service is running on Debian system
[centos] Verify: TEST_CASE: Check if port 80 is open (Apache) port=80, host={{ ansible_default_ipv4.address | default('127.0.0.1') }}, state=started, timeout=5
[ubuntu] Verify: TEST_CASE: Check if port 80 is open (Apache) port=80, host={{ ansible_default_ipv4.address | default('127.0.0.1') }}, state=started, timeout=5
[centos] Verify: TEST_CASE: Assert port 80 is accessible that=['apache_port_check.state == "started"'], fail_msg=Port 80 is not accessible, success_msg=Port 80 is accessible
[ubuntu] Verify: TEST_CASE: Assert port 80 is accessible that=['apache_port_check.state == "started"'], fail_msg=Port 80 is not accessible, success_msg=Port 80 is accessible
